review:
They turned the same 7yo game into F2P and now they want your money again so they milk you by proposing cheesy expensive skins, and paid scarce PvE missions (instead of the PvE game that they promised before). It's not Blizzard's anymore it's Activision's child that tries to look like an EA's product.

Don't pay a cent for this shit, find a better place for your money and your time.

review as day one original overwatch player and not trolling.
this game is long gone :( i remembered the day before it become esport playing 5 rein and 1 mercy with randos just to have fun charging and smashing just for laugh and 6v6 all s76 on casual match all pretent to be call of duty is amazing fun.
but it's all gone to roll locked in casual nerf widow is kinda questionable. refusing to adapt and demand nerf on heroes they dont like. i agreed with many changes but also not in many as well.
but now? it's 5v5 with very very bad microtransaction. game become pay to win because without hero to counter play another tteam, it's a hard mode on bullshit noodles. and now they just destroy my hope and dream to play pve coop with friend with cool progressions and big replay value. into......this thing.....which cost 15 dollars. like.....why?
good bye my Zarya main my zarya golden gun, mercy breast cancer skin, and many cool skins i paid and played to unlocked. i might not even play this game again until they improve it.

"The people who make Overwatch porn work harder than the people who make Overwatch"- real

Overwatch 2 is an under-delivered "update" to Overwatch 1. There's new characters, new maps, a single new game mode, and skins that you used to get for free now cost 20$ each. The PvE that was promised and was the reason for Overwatch 1s death was secretly cancelled before this game's launch and now bits and crumbs of it are being sold to us for 15$.

Overwatch 2 is a scam. A ploy by Blizzard to try and milk as much money off of their players as they believe possible. Don't fall victim to the predatory tactics they use to get you to buy literal trash. Stop giving money to companies that don't respect you, or your time.

Game used to be actually fun to play, Blizzard decided to throw it all away in favor of an intrusive and predatory cash shop. They also canned all PVE which was the whole reason for going to OW2, so they could instead rebrand it and try to sell it to us. Sad to see what became of a once great game, Money and greed ruin everything.

There are missions now. "Variety of dramatic scenarios" locked behind a paywall with only one mission free.. Is it something new? No, just event that happened like 6 years ago in Ow1 :DDD. Im really happy that i paid 60e for a game that Blizzard deleted, promised tons of changes, released the same game with number 2 and slapped price tag on everything. But hey, now i can grind 50 years to unlock new hero and to level up badge on a hero i already have 200 hours from the original game. Or i can pay. I thought Ubisoft is greedy but you Blizzard? You are just pure evil at this point. People coming up with this brilliant idea can rot in hell.
